name: Ninja: New Legends
description:
Experience the world of the mega-hit anime, manga, and novel series Ninja - 3D MMORPG on mobile! You are challenged in this game to work out the best strategy and beat other shinobi in battle as an adventurer. You will participate in the original story background of ninja, facing different challenges and quests every day. Engage in scroll battles with different players, and countless treasure waiting for you to explore. Shinobi, let's set off for Ninja World!

* CREATE THE ULTIMATE NINJA CLAN
Collect your favorite shinobi from the adventure! Enhance and evolve your ninja to build and become the strongest clan.

* CLASSIC BATTLES & STORYLINE IN NINJA
Relive classic story plot,and immerse yourself into the life of shinobi.

* REAL-TIME COMBAT, TOP-CLASS NINJUTSU FIGHT
The war is about to go on! Ninkai Taisen! Use the classic ninjutsu to defend your fortress and village.
